title: Mastering the Heading Widget
description: Learn how to create beautiful headings and titles using Elementor's Heading widget.

blocks.content: The Heading widget is one of the most fundamental elements in Elementor, perfect for creating titles, subtitles, and section headers with professional typography.

Essential features of the Heading widget:

  • HTML tag selection (H1-H6)
  • Advanced typography controls
  • Text alignment options
  • Blend modes and text shadows
  • Responsive text sizing

Customize your headings with these styling options:

  • Font family and weight
  • Text color and background
  • Letter spacing and line height
  • Text decoration
  • Text stroke effects

author: admin
